cleaned_text: Dr. Janet Piscitelli M.D. Pathologist | Anatomic Pathology & Clinical Pathology1 Malcolm Teterboro NJ, 07608 [Show map](#) About Dr. Janet Piscitelli is a pathologist practicing in Teterboro, NJ. Dr. Piscitelli is a doctor who specializes in the study of bodily fluids and tissues. As a pathologist, Dr. Piscitelli can help your primary care doctor make a diagnosis about your medical condition. Dr. Piscitelli may perform a tissue biopsy to determine if a patient has cancer, practice genetic testing, and complete a number of laboratory examinations. Pathologists can also perform autopsies which can determine a persons cause of death and gain information about genetic progression of a disease.
